metadata.title: CVE-2019-8844 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in tvOS 13.3, watchOS 6.1.1, iCloud forWindows 10.9, iOS 13.3 and iPadOS 13.3, Safari 13.0.4, iTunes 12.10.3 forWindows, iCloud for Windows 7.16. Processing maliciously crafted webcontent may lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
